item.title: Calling all @JuniperNetworks automators headed to #NXTWORK! The @ansible team will be in the @redhat booth showing off the newest Junos OS resource modules and of course giving out stickers. Check it out: https://www.ansible.com/blog/network-features-coming-soon-in-ansible-engine-2.9 …

item.title: We have an upcoming webinar about #Ansible Automation Analytics. Walk through enabling this feature on Ansible Tower, accessing it on https://red.ht/32aYWgZ , and showing the use cases we provide today. Register today:https://bit.ly/2qg3fdv
item.dc:creator: (@ansible)
item.description: We have an upcoming webinar about #Ansible Automation Analytics. Walk through enabling this feature on Ansible Tower, accessing it on https://red.ht/32aYWgZ , and showing the use cases we provide today. Register today: https://bit.ly/2qg3fdv

item.title: To simplify and better automate its public key infrastructure (PKI) environment, @Siemens worked closely with #RedHat to replace its legacy #automation solution with @Ansible #Automation. Learn more about Siemens and other Red Hat customer successes: https://red.ht/36asQoE pic.twitter.com/yQ0WjNzKsr
item.dc:creator: (@RedHatAR)
item.description: To simplify and better automate its public key infrastructure (PKI) environment, @Siemens worked closely with #RedHat to replace its legacy #automation solution with @Ansible #Automation. Learn more about Siemens and other Red Hat customer successes: https://red.ht/36asQoE  pic.twitter.com/yQ0WjNzKsr

item.title: Interested in getting some hands on experience with #Ansible and #Windows? There is a Windows Automation with Ansible Workshop in Hartford, CT on Nov. 14. You can learn more and register here: https://red.ht/36nKc1B
item.dc:creator: (@ansible)
item.description: Interested in getting some hands on experience with #Ansible and #Windows? There is a Windows Automation with Ansible Workshop in Hartford, CT on Nov. 14. You can learn more and register here: https://red.ht/36nKc1B

item.title: @ansible 2.9.0 has been released! Get it on PyPI: pip install ansible==2.9.0, https://releases.ansible.com/ansible/ , the Ansible PPA on Launchpad, or GitHub. Happy automating!
item.dc:creator: (@abadger1999)
item.description: @ansible 2.9.0 has been released! Get it on PyPI: pip install ansible==2.9.0, https://releases.ansible.com/ansible/ , the Ansible PPA on Launchpad, or GitHub. Happy automating!

item.title: The @ansible office in @CityofDurhamNC has the most amazing costumes for Halloween 2019! I am Spiderman Noir from Spider-Man: Into the Spider-Verse. Even some dogs came and dressed up!! See if you can spot @bizonks @thedoubl3J @andriusb @annaucbo @ElleLathram @benthomasson ...pic.twitter.com/PRoeFyNK7Z
item.dc:creator: (@IPvSean)
